      • addVuMeterObserver

        void addVuMeterObserver(int range,
                      int channel,
                      boolean peak,
                      org.mozilla.javascript.Callable callback)
                        throws com.bitwig.base.control_surface.ControlSurfaceException
        Add an observer for a vu-meter of this track.
        Parameters:
        range - number of steps (ex. 128)
        channel - (0 - left, 1, right, -1 sum of both)
        peak - (true - peak, false, RMS)
        callback - callback function taking a single value argument
        Throws:
        com.bitwig.base.control_surface.ControlSurfaceException
